alert.note: Alert for Ballard; Carlisle; Fulton; Hickman (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 07 at 7:18PM EST until March 13 at 5:48AM EST by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Kentucky...Illinois...Missouri... Ohio River at Olmsted Lock and Dam and at Cairo. .Runoff from recent heavy rain has caused minor flooding on the lower Ohio River at Olmsted Lock and Dam and Cairo. The river is forecast to crest at both locations Thursday morning. For the Ohio River...including Olmsted Lock and Dam, and Cairo... Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY MONDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Ohio River at Cairo. * WHEN...Until early Monday morning. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:00 PM CST Tuesday the stage was 41.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 42.5 feet Thursday morning. It will then fall below flood stage late Sunday evening. - Flood stage is 40.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
